overview: And the Winners Are. is a never-seen-before look at the hearts and souls of Hollywood's biggest superstars in CBS/NBC reporter David Sheehan's most revealing conversations with 33 Oscar winners, at various times in their careers, including favorites, from Tom Hanks, Meryl Streep, Tom Cruise, and Nicole Kidman, to Barbra Streisand, Leonardo DiCaprio, Robert Redford, and Jack Nicholson, plus 25 more.
title: And the Winners Are!
